FuncDef: This command shows reachability details for the SF in the specified EVPN instance. This information is gathered from the EVPN routes learned from the peer.

ParaDef.Info: Displays information about the specified service ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Displays information about the specified IPv4 address up to 64 characters.
Displays information about the specified IPv6 address up to 64 characters.
Displays information about the specified the ESI value. Values-10-byte Ethernet Segment Identifier.
Displays map state status. Values-resolved, unresolved.
